title: S17 Ep83:  Supernatural News/Parashare: Short Attention Span Theater Edition w/Mallie Fox!
itunes:title: Supernatural News/Parashare: Short Attention Span Theater Edition w/Mallie Fox!
description:
Darkness Radio presents Supernatural News/Parashare: Short Attention Span Theater Edition with Mallie Fox!! 

Mishaps create opportunities, right?! And in a week where both Tim and Bruiser had many mishaps, Mallie Fox has donned her Newsperson cap, helped Tim gather stories and arrived on the scene to rescue this week!

This week,  The James Webb telescope has opened our eyes to the universe and gone back in time to show us one of the most spectacular pictures ever! A US fighter pilot was killed chasing a UFO and his death was covered up as his family calls for answers, The Loch Ness Monster may live in an 'Upside Down' type unioverse when it isn't in the Loch, and a South African Satanist Co-Founder has met Jesus in a supernatural encounter, and decides to turn to Christ after experiencing God's Love...

Wanna see Coyote Peterson's Bigfoot Skull hoax video? Click here:   https://www.unexplained-mysteries.com/news/359004/coyote-petersons-bigfoot-skull-video-released
